column4: Guys, I was wondering how I can make Launcher.exe and WoW.exe Executable? Every time I try to click the check box to make it run as one, it unchecks itself.
I have tried chmod from the command line.
I did.
It unchecks itself.
i suppose this is on fat32 or ntfs?
NTFS
It's on my external HDD.
well, both of them do not know any kind of unix rights
then how can I allow it to run as an exec'?
mounting the partition with the right parameters. which in some cases may be a bad idea as well.
or I have to make an EXT4 partition and copy it to it?
you do not have to, but this may be sensible though.
this was?
hu?
You said this may be more sensible.
Were you referring to making an EXT4 partition on the NTFS Drive?
copying it to a partition with a proper filesystem as e.g. ext3/4
If tomatos are fruit, doesn't that mean that ketchup is a smoothie?
any reason why it's saying I don't have permission to copy to the EXT4 drive I just  made on this external HDD? Copying from NTFS->EXT4. Must I gksudo nautilis?
Anyone  reason why it's saying I don't have permission to copy to the EXT4 drive I just  made on this external HDD? Copying from NTFS->EXT4. Must I gksudo nautilis?
i guess you're lacking write permission on the new partition.
ok
I got it. Had to go to media and right click the drive and give permission.
